title: Setup Distributed Tracing with Jaeger and OpenTelemetry
description: Setup distributed tracing using Jaeger and OpenTelemetry.

effort_estimate.justification: Distributed tracing helps in identifying performance bottlenecks and understanding the flow of requests across services.

user_stories: As a developer, I want to trace requests across services so that I can identify performance bottlenecks and dependencies.
business_rules: Jaeger backend must be set up to store traces.
OpenTelemetry Collector must be configured to collect and process traces.
Trace sampling strategies must be implemented to reduce the volume of trace data.
Grafana must be integrated to visualize trace data.
edge_cases: Handling high volumes of trace data.
Ensuring trace data is correlated with logs and metrics.

acceptance_criteria: Jaeger backend is running and storing traces.
OpenTelemetry Collector is configured to collect and process traces.
Grafana is integrated to visualize trace data.

additional_context.technical_notes: Ensure Jaeger and OpenTelemetry are properly configured and integrated with the application.
additional_context.security_considerations: Secure the tracing system to prevent unauthorized access to trace data.
